history.content:
1. An online application will be made available near the end of the document. Just fill it out and submit it.

2. The application is only processed after all grades are in, so yes.

3. I believe you can take upper divs to help boost your GPA.

4. IIRC, about a week or so after final grades come out. (Edit: could take longer, depends on when they decide to process)

----------------------------------

@301 states upper divs don't count towards your declaration gpa for the new 3.3 requirements

1. An online application will be made available near the end of the document. Just fill it out and submit it.

2. The application is only processed after all grades are in, so yes.

3. I believe you can take upper divs to help boost your GPA.

4. IIRC, about a week or so after final grades come out. (Edit: could take longer, depends on when they decide to process)

children.subject: Also look out on FB near the end of the semester.
thanks! and is there a specific group on FB I should join?
Sorry wasn't clear - where can I find this application?

history.content:
I am taking my last two pre-requisites this semester and plan on declaring at the end of the semester. I have a few questions:

1. How does the process work? Do I submit a formal document?

2. Right now, my GPA is below the cap - but hopefully if I do well in the classes I take this semester I can reach the cap. Is this okay for petitioning?

3. What if my GPA ends up being lower than the GPA cap? Can I take an upper-div or some other way to satisfy the requirement?

4. When do we find out if we've been accepted into the L&S CS major?

EDIT: Can an instructor also please confirm? Thank you!
history.subject: What is the procedure to be taken for declaring L&S CS?

history.content:
